alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 3:40PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern St. Johns and southeastern Duval Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 340 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over World Golf Village, or 11 miles southeast of Fruit Cove, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... World Golf Village, Palm Valley, Sawgrass, South Ponte Vedra, Nocatee, Durbin, Guana River State Park and Vilano Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns
